answer: The duration of a BTech program is 4 years.

answer: A BTech program consists of 8 semesters.

question: what are the departmental activities and Association activities of Aritificial and Data Science Department?
answer: for departmental activities of the Aritificial and Data Science Department can be viewed at the following link https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Clubs-Chapters1

question: What is Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS)?
answer: Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS) is an engineering program started in the academic year 2022–23 under Nitte Deemed to be University. It aims to create experts in the domain of data science by providing technical skills in data processing, analysis, and visualization for real-time applications across various domains. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the key objectives of the AI & DS program?
answer: The key objectives of the AI & DS program include equipping students with the technical skills to perform data processing, analysis, and visualization; providing knowledge of methodologies, processes, techniques, and tools from computing and information science to extract knowledge from structured and unstructured data; and fostering the ability to design software systems for intelligent decision-making in business applications. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the core concepts covered in the AI & DS program?
answer: The core concepts covered in the AI & DS program include applications of mathematical concepts for data handling, various methods for data handling and analysis, applications of data analysis in artificial intelligence domains, and the development of data-driven solutions and data visualization tools for analyzing big data. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program incorporate artificial intelligence concepts?
answer: The AI & DS program incorporates artificial intelligence concepts by covering topics related to machine learning, deep learning model building, and the utilization of AI techniques for solving computational and real-world problems. These concepts are integrated into the curriculum to enable students to develop intelligent data-driven solutions. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the potential career pathways for graduates of the AI & DS program?
answer: Graduates of the AI & DS program can pursue careers as data scientists, data analysts, machine learning engineers, AI specialists, data engineers, business intelligence analysts, and data visualization experts. They can work in various industries such as technology, finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and more, leveraging their expertise in data science and artificial intelligence. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program contribute to the field of data science?
answer: The AI & DS program contributes to the field of data science by training students in advanced data processing techniques, data analysis methodologies, and AI-driven solutions. Graduates are equipped to handle big data challenges, develop predictive models, and extract actionable insights from complex datasets, thereby advancing the capabilities of data science in real-world applications. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program prepare students for real-world applications?
answer: The AI & DS program prepares students for real-world applications by providing hands-on training in data processing tools, data analysis techniques, and AI model building. Projects and case studies from various domains are integrated into the curriculum to give students practical experience in solving industry-relevant problems. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are some specific skills that students will gain from the AI & DS program?
answer: Students will gain skills such as programming in languages like Python and R, data manipulation and cleansing, statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, deep learning techniques, data visualization using tools like Tableau or Matplotlib, and the ability to deploy AI models in production environments. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program address the ethical considerations in data science and AI?
answer: The AI & DS program includes modules on ethics and responsible AI, covering topics such as data privacy, bias in algorithms, transparency in AI systems, and ethical considerations in data collection and usage. Students are encouraged to consider the societal impacts of their data-driven solutions. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: Can students in the AI & DS program participate in research activities?
answer: Yes, students in the AI & DS program may have opportunities to participate in research activities through collaborations with faculty members or industry partners. These activities can involve exploring new AI algorithms, conducting experiments on real datasets, or contributing to ongoing research projects in data science. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: Are there internship opportunities for AI & DS students during their studies?
answer: Many AI & DS programs offer internship opportunities for students to gain practical experience in industry settings. These internships can be with companies specializing in data science, AI development, or related fields, providing valuable exposure and networking opportunities. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program stay updated with the latest trends in data science and AI?
answer: The AI & DS program often collaborates with industry experts, invites guest speakers, organizes workshops and seminars, and updates its curriculum regularly to incorporate the latest trends in data science and AI. Faculty members may also engage in research and professional development to stay current. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are some capstone or final-year projects students can expect in the AI & DS program?
answer: In the final year of the AI & DS program, students may work on capstone projects that involve solving real-world problems using data science and AI techniques. Examples could include developing predictive models, creating data visualization dashboards, or implementing AI solutions for business optimization. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: Can students pursue certifications alongside the AI & DS program to enhance their skills?
answer: Yes, students can pursue certifications such as Certified Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or certifications from platforms like Coursera, edX, or Microsoft Azure. These certifications complement the skills learned in the AI & DS program and enhance students' employability. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program encourage interdisciplinary learning?
answer: The AI & DS program encourages interdisciplinary learning by incorporating courses from related fields such as computer science, mathematics, statistics, and business management. Students gain a holistic understanding of data science and AI by exploring diverse perspectives and approaches. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What support does the AI & DS program provide for career placement and job readiness?
answer: The AI & DS program often has career placement cells or services that offer resume building workshops, interview preparation sessions, networking opportunities with industry professionals, and job placement assistance. Alumni networks and industry partnerships also contribute to job readiness for graduates. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are Dr. Venugopala P S's educational qualifications?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S has a B. E in Computer Science and Engineering from KVG College of Engineering, Sullia in 2002, M. Tech in Computer Science from NITK, Surathkal in 2007, and Ph.D from VTU, Belagavi in 2018.

question: What is Dr. Venugopala P S's past experience?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S has been working at NMAMIT since 2002.

question: What are Dr. Venugopala P S's areas of interest?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S's areas of interest include data science and data analytics, mobile application development, image and video processing, programming in Python, Java, C, and C++, machine learning, database systems, business intelligence, and the Internet of Things.

question: What are Dr. Venugopala P S's departmental responsibilities?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S is the Head of the Department and a team member of the project Vriddhi by Nitte University. They are also a member of the Internal Quality Assurance Cell at NMAMIT.

question: What are Dr. Venugopala P S's professional memberships?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S is a Senior member of IEEE, an Executive Committee member of IEEE Mangalore, and a member of ISTE.

question: What subjects does Dr. Venugopala P S handle?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S handles subjects including Python Programming, Android programming, RDBMS, Object Oriented Programming, IoT, Algorithms, and Image Processing.

question: What are Dr. Venugopala P S's conference/journal publications?
answer: Dr. Venugopala P S's conference/journal publications can be found at https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=7ituX_kAAAAJ and https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=56126960700.

question: What are Dr. Ankitha K's educational qualifications?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K has a Ph.D. from Mangalore University in 2022, M. Tech. from Sahyadri College of Engineering and Management in 2014, and B. E. from Shree Devi Institute of Technology in 2010.

question: What is Dr. Ankitha K's past experience?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K has worked as an Associate Professor & HoD in the department of Computer Science and Design at Canara Engineering College, Benjanapadavu from August 2022 to July 2023, and as an Associate Professor in the department of Computer Science and Engineering at Canara Engineering College, Benjanapadavu from April 2022 to July 2022. They also worked as an Assistant Professor in the department of Computer Science and Engineering at Sahyadri College of Engineering and Management, Adyar from January 2012 to March 2022, and as a Lecturer in the department of Information Science and Engineering at Alva’s Institute of Engineering and Technology, Moodbidri from June 2010 to December 2011.

question: What are Dr. Ankitha K's areas of interest?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K's areas of interest include Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, Machine Learning, Internet of Animal Health Things (IoAHT).

question: What are Dr. Ankitha K's departmental responsibilities?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K serves as a Research coordinator and Internship coordinator.

question: What are Dr. Ankitha K's professional memberships?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K is a Life Member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE).

question: What subjects does Dr. Ankitha K handle?
answer: Dr. Ankitha K handles subjects including Computer Networks, Advanced Computer Networks, Python, Data Structures and Applications, Unix and Shell Programming, Programming in JAVA, Internet of Things, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, C programming for Problem Solving, Cryptography, Network Security and Cyber Laws, Machine Learning, Formal Language and Automata Theory, Operating Systems, Object Oriented Modeling and Design, Big Data, Adhoc Networks, and Object Oriented Programming.

question: What are Dr. Ankitha K's conference/journal publications?

question: What are Mr. Muralli S Iyer's educational qualifications?
